name: ai-course-builder
description: Complete AI Course Builder application with microservices architecture

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend/ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../api-gateway && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm run start-ai" "npm run start-gateway" "npm run start-frontend"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules backend/*/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/ai-service/__pycache__ backend/ai-service/*.pyc

author: AI Course Builder Team
